_README: 1. import_sheets: Add as many external Excel files as you need.
Copy the block and change source_file, source_sheet, target_sheet_name.
2. target_sheets: Add as many sheets as you want to add formula columns to.
Each sheet has its own 'new_columns' list - add/remove freely.
{Column Header}  -> replaced with column letter based on header name in row 1
Example: {Assignee}{row} becomes F2, F3, etc. if Assignee is in column F
4. Supports ALL Excel formulas: VLOOKUP, IF, IFERROR, TEXT, SUM, AVERAGE,
COUNTIF, SUMIF, CONCATENATE, LEFT, RIGHT, LEN, nested formulas, etc.
5. New columns can reference each other (processed in order).
